findings.message: <x> += <y> costs more gas than <x> = <x> + <y> for state variables.
findings.name: inefficient-state-variable-increment

findings.message: A lot of times there is no risk that the loop counter can overflow. Using Solidity's unchecked block saves the overflow checks.
findings.name: unnecessary-checked-arithmetic-in-loop

findings.message: Consider using custom errors as they are more gas efficient while allowing developers  to describe the error in detail using NatSpec.

findings.message: Shortening revert strings to fit in 32 bytes will decrease gas costs for deployment and  gas costs when the revert condition has been met.
findings.name: use-short-revert-string
